code: var data = [{        name: '吕布',        value: 10000,        suffix: '战力'    },    {        name: '赵云',        value: 9900,        suffix: '战力'    },    {        name: '典韦',        value: 9800,        suffix: '战力'    },    {        name: '姜维',        value: 8000,        suffix: '战力'    },    {        name: '邓艾',        value: 6000,        suffix: '战力'    },    {        name: '邓1艾',        value: 6000,        suffix: '战力'    }]console.log(data)option = {    backgroundColor: '#fff',    tooltip: {},    animationDurationUpdate: function(idx) {        // 越往后的数据延迟越大        return idx * 100;    },    animationEasingUpdate: 'bounceIn',    color: ['red', 'blue', 'green'],    series: [{        type: 'graph',        layout: 'force',        force: {            repulsion: 500,            edgeLength: 10        },        roam: true,        label: {            show: true,            fontSize: 20,            formatter: function(d) {                console.log(d)                var data = d.data;                return data.name + '\n' + data.value + data.suffix            }        },        symbolSize: 100,        data: data    }]}
